text:
Apple | Software Engineer - JavaScript | Bay Area, Vancouver, Toronto | Onsite | Full-time Our team works on the web versions of the iWork Suite. We're hiring developers to work on the in-browser JavaScript applications.

Reach out directly or apply here: https://jobs.apple.com/us/search?#specs&ss=113182979&t=0&so=...

The posting says SCV, but we are open to Vancouver or Toronto as well.
